text: @KeasdenKate @EnvAgency @NaturalEngland This action is not likely to reduce flood risk https://t.co/SlS10lW2Vj

@KeasdenKate @SteveCJjones @EnvAgency Let's just stop speculating and stick to what we know.
1 - The affected stretch was within the SSSI and above the SAC
2- Damage has been done and NE, EA, FC, West Mercia Police and Herefordshire Council are investigating. 
3 - NE have issued a stop order.

@KeasdenKate @EnvAgency @NaturalEngland Lot of mis-information flying around at the moment Kate. Let's wait and see what the facts are - we're trying to find the facts believe me. Wouldn't necessarily give much credence to what the alleged perpetrator says!
